review: It actually exceeded my expectations.  I just wish there were better parental controls.  You can block the whole device to stop kids from get into the system, but I wish there was a way to block certain types of content as well.
author: Urban

review: Took 3 levels of Amazon customer support to get the upgrade to load, but now that its working, we absolutely love it!
author: dee faust

review: love my amazon stick since day one...have had it for few months
author: Glenda

review: I am so sorry I didn't buy this earlier!  I absolutely love the Fire TV Stick!
author: Shee Covarrubias

review: Easy to use, like the extension cord that's included without having to pay extra for everything else, very thoughtful.
author: Victor Chu

review: Works just like I thought it would.
author: gerry rissman
